SEARCH
Module org.autogui
Package org.autogui.swing.util

Class MenuBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.autogui.swing.util.MenuBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
ObjectTableModel.MenuBuilderWithEmptySeparator
public class MenuBuilder extends Object
a utility for menu construction. 
     [menu:
        JLabel("title"),
        item1,
        item2,
        item3,
        ...
        item_maxItems-1,
        JMenu("... items"): [
            item_maxItems,
            item_maxItems+1,
            ...
            item_maxItems+maxSubItems-1,
            JMenu("... items"): [ ...]
          ]]
